title: Butterfly fairy cakes
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) salted butter', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar', '2 eggs', '110g (4 oz) self raising flour', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon milk', 'For the buttercream icing', '150g (5 oz) unsalted butter', '250g (9 oz) icing sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '4 tablespoons strawberry jam', 'icing sugar, for dusting']
